list.name: Default Changelist
list.comment: testing looks good proceding with 1.20.1 beta release

task.summary: fixed crash when combining curses with shields in anvil
fixed crash when combining curses with shields in anvil
added bows and fixed a few things
added missing shield single addition recipes
added crossbows and refactored item texture names
added quivers and their ability to hold arrows
added arrow item pickup into quiver
added arrow entity pickup into quiver fixed quiver gui rendering
made gui rendering of quiver more flexible and less visually cluttered
arrow slots now don't render the hover sheen when not used
refactored config and merged all materials
added tipped arrow recipe and potion weapon recipe
added non-vanilla swords to proper tags for recipes
added fiery burn and knight metal extra damage based on armor
added weapon large ing hand models
fixed gauntlet damage when holding weapons
added fletching table functionality and all associated recipes
added fletching table functionality and all associated recipes
fixed some bugs involving quivers arrows and materials
fixed weapon model rotations and positions in hand
jei support for fletching and quiver not tested yet
jei support for fletching confirmed works
added jei support for Shield smithing
